summary: This is an email from Michael Hantman, a partner at Holland & Knight LLP, to an Assistant U.S. Attorney named Alex, transmitting a production cover letter in response to a subpoena issued to First Bank Puerto Rico. It is part of legal compliance and document production in an investigation.

persons.name: Michael Hantman
persons.context: He is the sender of the email, transmitting a production cover letter in response to a subpoena to First Bank Puerto Rico on behalf of his law firm.

persons.name: Alex
persons.context: The recipient of the email, addressed by first name, to whom the subpoena response documents are being sent.

connections.description: Hantman, representing a law firm, is sending legal documents (subpoena response) to the AUSA Alex as part of an official investigation.

events.title: Production of Subpoena Response
events.description: Michael Hantman sends an email with an attached cover letter regarding the production of documents by First Bank Puerto Rico in response to a subpoena.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to First Bank Puerto Rico as part of an investigation, requiring document production.
The law firm Holland & Knight LLP, via partner Michael Hantman, is handling the legal response to the subpoena.
The communication is directed to an Assistant U.S. Attorney named Alex, indicating ongoing federal legal proceedings.
The email includes standard legal confidentiality and privilege disclaimers typical for attorney correspondence.
